briefdescription.para: < Start of include guard for STRUCTS_BASE_H.

detaileddescription.para: Definition of STRUCTS_BASE_H to signify the header has been included. Include standard string library for string manipulation. Include standard vector container for sequence storage. Include standard map container for key-value associations. Include enumerations used in the framework.

briefdescription.para: Builds a dictionary for a specific data type.

detaileddescription.para:
_name
Full name of the data type.
_shrt
Short alias for the data type.
This function registers a data type with the ROOT dictionary system, enabling serialization and deserialization of custom objects.

briefdescription.para: Registers an include path with the interpreter.

detaileddescription.para:
pth
Path to register.
is_abs
Flag indicating if the path is absolute (true) or relative (false).
This function adds a directory to the interpreter's include path, allowing it to find header files during runtime compilation.

briefdescription.para: Builds a Precompiled Module (PCM) file for a specific module.

detaileddescription.para:
name
Name of the module.
incl
Include path for the module.
exl
Flag indicating if the module should be excluded from certain operations.
This function generates a PCM file which speeds up loading and interpretation of C++ code in the ROOT framework.

briefdescription.para: Initiates the build of all dictionaries and PCM files.

detaileddescription.para: This function triggers the generation of all necessary dictionaries and PCM files for the types registered in the framework. This is typically called during initialization.

briefdescription.para: Counts occurrences of a substring within a string.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the string to search within.

simplesect.para: The number of occurrences of the substring.

briefdescription.para: Defines fundamental data structures and type handling for the AnalysisG framework.

detaileddescription.para: This file contains declarations for basic structures and functions that handle data type identification, conversion, and management across the framework. It provides essential functionality for type safety and data management in a heterogeneous, physics data analysis environment.
